function.name: get_stock_quote
function.description: Get real-time stock price, volume, market cap, and daily price change for a given ticker symbol.

ticker.description: Stock ticker symbol (e.g., AAPL, MSFT, TSLA)

function.name: get_financial_ratios
function.description: Retrieve fundamental financial ratios for a company including valuation, profitability, and leverage metrics.

ratios.description: List of ratios to retrieve. Options: pe_ratio, pb_ratio, ps_ratio, debt_to_equity, roe, roa, profit_margin, free_cash_flow_yield, dividend_yield, current_ratio

function.name: search_financial_news
function.description: Search recent financial news, analyst reports, and market commentary relevant to a query.

query.description: Search query for financial news (e.g., 'AAPL earnings Q4 2025')

days_back.description: Number of days to look back for news articles

function.name: get_market_overview
function.description: Get a snapshot of major market indices (S&P 500, NASDAQ, DJI, Russell 2000), VIX, and sector performance.

include_sectors.description: Whether to include sector-level performance breakdown

function.name: get_treasury_yields
function.description: Get current US Treasury yield curve data across maturities (1M, 3M, 6M, 1Y, 2Y, 5Y, 10Y, 30Y).

function.name: screen_stocks
function.description: Screen stocks based on fundamental criteria. Returns a list of matching tickers with key metrics.

min_market_cap_b.description: Minimum market cap in billions USD

function.name: get_economic_indicators
function.description: Retrieve key macroeconomic indicators: CPI, unemployment rate, GDP growth, Fed funds rate, and consumer confidence.

indicators.description: List of indicators: cpi, unemployment, gdp_growth, fed_funds_rate, consumer_confidence, pmi
